      • runProgram

        public void runProgram()
                throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Description copied from interface: edu.wmich.cs1120.Ghali.LA5.IController
        This method displays the menu to the user, uses a try-catch block to read in the input from the user and, based on the user's choice, calls one of the three "convert..." methods in this class. This method should keep prompting the user for input until the user wants to quit.
        Specified by:
        runProgram in interface edu.wmich.cs1120.Ghali.LA5.IController
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      • convertTextToSMS

        public void convertTextToSMS()
        Description copied from interface: edu.wmich.cs1120.Ghali.LA5.IController
        This method prompts the user for text to be converted into SMS-text. It uses the SMS object in this class to call the appropriate method in the SMS class to do the conversion from text to SMS-text.
        Specified by:
        convertTextToSMS in interface edu.wmich.cs1120.Ghali.LA5.IController

      • convertSMSToText

        public void convertSMSToText()
        Description copied from interface: edu.wmich.cs1120.Ghali.LA5.IController
        This method prompts the user for SMS-text to be converted into normal text. It uses the SMS object in this class to call the appropriate method in the SMS class to do the conversion from SMS-text to normal text.
        Specified by:
        convertSMSToText in interface edu.wmich.cs1120.Ghali.LA5.IController

      • convertTextToPigLatin

        public void convertTextToPigLatin()
        Description copied from interface: edu.wmich.cs1120.Ghali.LA5.IController
        This method prompts the user for a word to be converted to PigLatin. It uses the PigLatin object to call the appropriate method in the PigLatin class to do the required conversion. To convert to PigLatin, remove the first letter of the word and append to what is left of the word, then append "ay". So, "hello" becomes "ellohay".
        Specified by:
        convertTextToPigLatin in interface edu.wmich.cs1120.Ghali.LA5.IController
